Kokkos::parallel_for("Jacobi operation", n, KOKKOS_LAMBDA(const int i)
{ const double fouri = 4.0 * i; const double gravpsi = grav_ /((double)( n )+1.0) * (i + 1.0); const double epsi = eps_ * gravpsi; unew(i) = 0.125 * (u(i - 1) + u(i + 1) + u(i - n) + u(i + n) - gravpsi) - epsi * (u(i + n) - u(i - n) + u(i + 1) - u(i - 1) - 2.0 * u(i)); });

KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION void jacobi_parallel(Kokkos::View<u_type***> u, Kokkos::View <u_type***> unew, int n, int niter) { for(int iter = 0; iter < niter; ++iter) { Kokkos::parallel_for(n, KOKKOS_LAMBDA(const size_t i) { for(int j = 1; j < n - 1; ++j) for(int k = 1; k < n - 1; ++k) unew(i, j, k) = 0.125 * (u(i - 1, j, k) + u(i + 1, j, k) + u(i, j - 1, k) + u(i, j + 1, k) + u(i, j, k - 1) + u(i, j, k + 1) + u(i, j, k)); }); u = unew; } }
